meta-review.comment: Batman: Arkham City offers a truly immersive and expansive gameplay experience that surpasses its predecessor and sets a new standard for superhero games. The open-world, filled with secrets and side quests, provides hours of exploration and replay value. The game's sense of progression, in both gameplay and storytelling, is commendable. It's a must-have for any Batman fan and a strong contender for Game of the Year.
